name: Sampath Bank Paycorp payment gateway
author: RedEvoke Solutions

sections.description:
Sampath Bank paycrop payment gateway allows your customers to make online payment for your product and services via credit and debit cards. This simple online payment gateway shopping plugin lets you sell products and services directly from your own site and offers reliable shopping experience for your buyers.

It is known as a powerful plugin because of its simplicity. You do not need to devote days setting the plugin up. Simply install the plugin, and in few minutes, customers around the world can start buying services or products from your website without any hassle. The plugin is highly secured against online threats and hackers.

It accepts all internationally recognised and acceptable cards. This will boost your sales because customers from different part of the world can buy your products and services with their indigenous credit cards.

It also allows users to make their online payment on your website easily. It is user friendly and requires no technical know-how when setting up. The plugin is above all easy to set up thanks to natural interface.

RedEvoke sampath paycorp payment gateway plugin is one of the most popular plugin being used by a large number of ecommerce merchants in Sri Lanka.
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers
itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install,
log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type plugin name and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found
our plugin you can install it by simply clicking Install Now.

Manual installation

1.Download plugin zip file
2.Unzip and upload to (wp-content/plugins) directory or upload zip file and install it
from Plugins->Add new->Upload
3.Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
4.Enter payment gateway details in woocommerce->settings->checkout->[IPG NAME] and Enable payment gateway
5.That’s all you need to do. You will notice Payment gateway option in Checkout page.

screenshots.caption: Activate the "Sampath Paycorp Payment Gateway" plugin available in the installed plugins page.
Enter all the Payment gateway details provided by Sampath bank in the above shown panel.
Sampath IPG payment option will be displayed to user in checkout page
